mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO taskGeneric (genericKey,jsonValue,taskType,priority,createTime) select CONCAT(#{genericKey},'_do',id), CONCAT('{"id":',id,'"orderNo":',orderNo,'"familyId":',familyId,'"familyTotal":',${familyTotal},'}'), #{taskType}, #{priority},now() from familyGameAsset where seasonName=#{season} order by id limit ${limit}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) from familyGameAsset where seasonName=#{season}
SELECT * from taskGeneric where genericKey=#{genericKey} and taskStatus=1
mapper.update: UPDATE taskGeneric SET taskStatus=-1,taskFlag=#{taskFlag},taskDealTime=${taskDealTime} WHERE taskStatus = 0 and taskFlag='0' LIMIT 5
mapper.select: SELECT * from taskGeneric where taskStatus=-1 and taskFlag=#{taskFlag}
mapper.update: UPDATE taskGeneric SET taskStatus=0,taskFlag='0',failTimes=failTimes+1 WHERE taskStatus=-1 and taskDealTime<${compareTimes}
